root.name: The Smurfs Dance Party
root.description: OverviewThe Smurfs Dance Party is a movie tie-in game that allows up to 4 players at a time to dance alongside classic Smurf characters like Smurfette, Papa Smurf, Clumsy, Brainy, Gutsy and even Gargamel. Players have a choice of a wide selection of musical genres, including Pop, RB, Rock and Punk.Song ListRun DMC - Walk This WayWhitney Houston - I Wanna Dance with SomebodyMichael Jackson - Blame it on the BoogieKaty Perry - One of the BoysSelena Gomez and The Scene - A Year Without RainAly and AJ - Like WhoaApache Indian - Boom-Shak-A-LakTaio Cruz featuring Kylie Minogue - HigherDuck Sauce - Barbra StreisandBruno Mars - Just the Way You AreWho Let the Smurfs Out (parody of Baha Men’s “Who Let the Dogs Out)We Like to Smurf It (Parody Reel 2 Real's I Like to Move It)*Mr Smurftastic (Parody of Shaggy’s Mr. Boomtastic) *The Noisy Smurf *Bob Sinclar Sugarhill Gang - The Lala SongSmurfberry-liciousGo Go Go Get ItMore Than a NameVery Blue MoonGargamelWe Hav UsAltar featuring Jeanie Tracy - Everybody UpWelcome to NY*From The Smurf’s Go Pop CD
